    • encode

      @NotNull public static @NotNull EncodedNumber encode​(@NotNull Paillier.PaillierPublicKey publicKey, java.lang.Object scalar) throws Util.ValueErrorException, Util.TypeErrorException
      Parameters:
      publicKey - the public key of ciphertext
      scalar - scalar to be encoded, must be BigInteger or BigDecimal
      Returns:
      EncodedNumber
      Throws:
      Util.ValueErrorException - if some value is lager than publicKey.maxInt
      Util.TypeErrorException - if class of scalar is not BigInteger or BigDecimal
      See Also:
